alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:18PM EDT until July 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN LAPEER COUNTY... At 418 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lapeer to near Dryden to near Romeo, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Imlay City around 440 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Thornville. People attending Eastern Michigan State Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
